classmeta.shortdesc: A simple container for storing font objects.

desc.para: A subclass of PangoFontset that provides a simple container for storing a set of PangoFont objects. The set of fonts in the object are assemble by using the append method.

method.shortdesc: Add a PangoFont to the object.

desc.para: Adds a PangoFont object specified by font to the fontset.

method.shortdesc: Returns the number of fonts in the fontset.

desc.para: This method counts and returns the number of PangoFont objects stored in the fontset.
